description: The sapMldSnpgGrpLimitExceeded notification is generated when an
MLD group is dropped on a given SAP because a user configurable
upper limit, given by sapMldSnpgCfgMaxNbrGrps, is reached.

event.Summary: MLD group is dropped on a SAP because a user configurable upper limit exceeded

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD TIMETRA-MLD-SNOOPING-MIB::sapMldSnpgGrpLimitExceeded TIMETRA-SERV-MIB::svcId u 9999 TIMETRA-SAP-MIB::sapPortId u 9999 TIMETRA-SAP-MIB::sapEncapValue u 9999 TIMETRA-MLD-SNOOPING-MIB::sapMldSnpgCfgMaxNbrGrps i 0 TIMETRA-MLD-SNOOPING-MIB::tmnxMldSnpgGroupAddressType i 0 TIMETRA-MLD-SNOOPING-MIB::tmnxMldSnpgGroupAddress s EXAM

description: The value of the object svcId specifies the Service identifier. This
value should be unique within the service domain.
variables.name: TIMETRA-SERV-MIB::svcId

description: The ID of the access port where this SAP is defined.
variables.name: TIMETRA-SAP-MIB::sapPortId

description: The value of the label used to identify this SAP on the access port
specified by sapPortId.
variables.name: TIMETRA-SAP-MIB::sapEncapValue

description: The value of the object sapMldSnpgCfgMaxNbrGrps specifies
how many group addresses are allowed for this SAP.
The value 0 means that no limit is imposed.
variables.name: TIMETRA-MLD-SNOOPING-MIB::sapMldSnpgCfgMaxNbrGrps

description: The value of the object tmnxMldSnpgGroupAddressType indicates
the type of tmnxMldSnpgGroupAddress.
variables.name: TIMETRA-MLD-SNOOPING-MIB::tmnxMldSnpgGroupAddressType

description: The value of the object tmnxMldSnpgGroupAddress indicates an IP
multicast group address.
variables.name: TIMETRA-MLD-SNOOPING-MIB::tmnxMldSnpgGroupAddress

description: The sapMldSnpgMcsFailure notification is generated when an
MLD group on a given SAP could not be synced to the MCS
(multi-chassis synchronization) database.

event.Summary: MLD group on a SAP not synced to the MCS database due to $v6

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD TIMETRA-MLD-SNOOPING-MIB::sapMldSnpgMcsFailure TIMETRA-SERV-MIB::svcId u 9999 TIMETRA-SAP-MIB::sapPortId u 9999 TIMETRA-SAP-MIB::sapEncapValue u 9999 TIMETRA-MLD-SNOOPING-MIB::tmnxMldSnpgGroupAddressType i 0 TIMETRA-MLD-SNOOPING-MIB::tmnxMldSnpgGroupAddress s EXAM TIMETRA-MLD-SNOOPING-MIB::tmnxMldSnpgMcsFailureReason s EXAMPLE

description: The value of the object svcId specifies the Service identifier. This
value should be unique within the service domain.
variables.name: TIMETRA-SERV-MIB::svcId

description: The ID of the access port where this SAP is defined.
variables.name: TIMETRA-SAP-MIB::sapPortId

description: The value of the label used to identify this SAP on the access port
specified by sapPortId.
variables.name: TIMETRA-SAP-MIB::sapEncapValue

description: The value of the object tmnxMldSnpgGroupAddressType indicates
the type of tmnxMldSnpgGroupAddress.
variables.name: TIMETRA-MLD-SNOOPING-MIB::tmnxMldSnpgGroupAddressType

description: The value of the object tmnxMldSnpgGroupAddress indicates an IP
multicast group address.
variables.name: TIMETRA-MLD-SNOOPING-MIB::tmnxMldSnpgGroupAddress

description: The value of the object tmnxMldSnpgMcsFailureReason indicates the
reason why the sapMldSnpgMcsFailure notification is sent.
variables.name: TIMETRA-MLD-SNOOPING-MIB::tmnxMldSnpgMcsFailureReason

description: The sdpBndMldSnpgGrpLimitExceeded notification is generated when an
MLD group is dropped on a given SDP bind because a user configurable
upper limit, given by sdpBndMldSnpgCfgMaxNbrGrps, is reached.

event.Summary: MLD group is dropped on a SDP bind because a user configurable upper limit exceeded

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD TIMETRA-MLD-SNOOPING-MIB::sdpBndMldSnpgGrpLimitExceeded TIMETRA-SERV-MIB::svcId u 9999 TIMETRA-SDP-MIB::sdpBindId s EXAMPLEE TIMETRA-MLD-SNOOPING-MIB::sdpBndMldSnpgCfgMaxNbrGrps i 0 TIMETRA-MLD-SNOOPING-MIB::tmnxMldSnpgGroupAddressType i 0 TIMETRA-MLD-SNOOPING-MIB::tmnxMldSnpgGroupAddress s EXAM

description: The value of the object svcId specifies the Service identifier. This
value should be unique within the service domain.
variables.name: TIMETRA-SERV-MIB::svcId

description: SDP Binding identifier.
variables.name: TIMETRA-SDP-MIB::sdpBindId

description: The value of the object sdpBndMldSnpgCfgMaxNbrGrps specifies
how many group addresses are allowed for this SDP bind.
The value 0 means that no limit is imposed.
variables.name: TIMETRA-MLD-SNOOPING-MIB::sdpBndMldSnpgCfgMaxNbrGrps

description: The value of the object tmnxMldSnpgGroupAddressType indicates
the type of tmnxMldSnpgGroupAddress.
variables.name: TIMETRA-MLD-SNOOPING-MIB::tmnxMldSnpgGroupAddressType

description: The value of the object tmnxMldSnpgGroupAddress indicates an IP
multicast group address.
variables.name: TIMETRA-MLD-SNOOPING-MIB::tmnxMldSnpgGroupAddress
